title: The Shadow of progress
creator_credit: Derek Williams, Humphrey Swingler, British Petroleum and Greenpark Productions
brief_description: Surveys the problems of exhaustion and destruction of natural resources, pollution and ecological disturbance due to industry, discussing examples of damage to the environment and of constructive counter-measures undertaken around the world.
creator_credit_for_label: Derek Williams, Humphrey Swingler, British Petroleum and Greenpark Productions
